channel.title: Last part of Portforwarding, plz help,
channel.description:
I have a Davolink DV-2020 Router but I can't get the portforwarding working. http://www.portforward.com/english/routers/port_forwarding/Davolink/DV-2020/1st_SMTP_Server.htm Is the guide on portforward.com.
Does anyone understand it and explain how to do it for a RSPS? Thanks alot

item.title: Last part of Portforwarding, plz help,
item.dc:creator: @pkforlol3 pkforlol3
item.description:
@pkforlol3 wrote:

and what ip i put there??[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 13, 2007, 10:01:02 AM[/size][hr]ip of my LAN?? or the ip it says at CMD ipconfig, 10.0.0.4??[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 13, 2007, 10:10:45 AM[/size][hr]i worked every ip to set on mopar, i added to my firewall name : 192.168.1.5
host: RVG
port: 43594
port: 43594

then…i got the 192.168.1.5 on dcu tpc and dcu/tpc and i got the server on…i wanna put on mopar it says server must be online to add to list.

Read full topic
item.source: Last part of Portforwarding, plz help,

item.title: Last part of Portforwarding, plz help,
item.dc:creator: @Dennis Dennis
item.description:
@Dennis wrote:

If you are on vista

Go to your Control Panel > Firewall > ‘Allow a program through windows firewall’ > Down at the bottom of Exceptions you will see ‘Add Port’ click on that > Name is like blahblahscape and the port is 43594 on a TCP protocol

For windows im sorry i forgot how to do, it may be the same.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Solid_snake1 Solid snake
item.description:
@Solid_snake1 wrote:

make sure after you portfoward you enable your server name on port 43594 and tcp thru ur firewall other wise name it RSPS on the port foward end and start port are 43594 and ip address is ur defult gateway
